quote.quotepara: IMO there are no technical advantages. The only one I can imagine is that content can be imported without setting up the meta data, which is not recommended :)

body.para: ah, one of those "flexibility" features :) no thanks.

quote.quotepara: we should rather provide a good import facility
Shall we start a vote? IMO we should not leave orphaned code in the codebase without a good reason.

body.para: absolutely. we had too many orphaned classes in 1.2, and people had a hard time understanding what best practice was.
